title: Polyphony
description: A full stack web application that allows users to stream their favorite tracks or albums in a chat room and interact with other users logged in. I built this application from the ground up starting with an ERD, building an API, making requests with Axios, and creating components with React.js. I also utilized SignalR to enable real-time chat functionality.

title: GameSphere
description: A React application which allows the user to keep track of which video games they own, which games they want, and which games they've played. Utilizing JSX and jQuery, I created bootstrap components in the DOM and incorporated RESTful requests using AJAX and JSON.

title: Movie Maker
description: A Single Page, Bootstrapped Application for producers to enter their budget for a movie to be made, which sets the cap of a progress bar. The user can then add and remove extravagant components to their budget and watch as the progress bar fills or empties in real time. Using JavaScript, I was able to experiment with filling and emptying a bootstrap progress bar by checking and unchecking boxes.

title: USVI Today
description: An example of my work using WordPress. USVI Today is a travel site for those interested in learning more about the U.S. Virgin Islands. A perfect example of just how scalable the WordPress platform can be. Started with basic site structure of 5 pages, expanded to just over 60 pages. Every page is full of hand-written, sourced information that was tailored to be highly ranked by search engines.

title: Aadwebb, Inc.
description: The website for the company I co-founded in 2017.
